Simple Code Examples
====================

This file contains simple code examples for testing.

Python Example
--------------

.. code-block:: python

   print("Hello, World!")

JavaScript Example
------------------

.. code-block:: javascript

   console.log("Hello, World!");

JSON Data
---------

.. code-block:: json

   {"name": "test", "value": 123}

Shell Command
-------------

.. code-block:: sh

   echo "Hello"
